content.raw:
To test dock:

`cd $HOME/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/worlds/yamls`

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=$(pwd)/dock_shallow.yaml world_xacro_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/`

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/dock_shallow0.world`

look at topics: /vrx/scan\_dock/placard\_symbol /vrx/task/info

To test scan and dock:

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=$(pwd)/scan_and_dock_shallow.yaml world_xacro_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/`

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/scan_and_dock_shallow0.world`

‌

To test nav shallow:

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=$(pwd)/nav_challenge_shallow.yaml world_xacro_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/`

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/nav_challenge_shallow0.world`

observe: /vrx/task/info

To test nav deep:

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=$(pwd)/nav_challenge_deep.yaml world_xacro_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/`

`roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/nav_challenge_deep0.world`

observe: /vrx/task/info
content.html:
To test dock:

cd $HOME/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/worlds/yamls

roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=$(pwd)/dock_shallow.yaml world_xacro_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/dock_shallow0.world

look at topics: /vrx/scan_dock/placard_symbol /vrx/task/info

To test scan and dock:

roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=$(pwd)/scan_and_dock_shallow.yaml world_xacro_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/scan_and_dock_shallow0.world

‌

To test nav shallow:

roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=$(pwd)/nav_challenge_shallow.yaml world_xacro_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/nav_challenge_shallow0.world

observe: /vrx/task/info

To test nav deep:

roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=$(pwd)/nav_challenge_deep.yaml world_xacro_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/world_xacros/ world_target:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/

roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:=$HOME/generated_worlds/worlds/nav_challenge_deep0.world

observe: /vrx/task/info
